comment:
* DOMLocatorImpl is an implementaion that describes a location (e.g. * where an error occured). *

See also the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Core Specification. * This class is a copy of the Xerces-2J class org.apache.xerces.dom.DOMLocatorImpl.java v 1.10 * * @author Gopal Sharma, SUN Microsystems Inc. * @version $Id: * * @xsl.usage internal

variables.name: fColumnNumber
variables.comment:
* The column number where the error occured, 
     * or -1 if there is no column number available.

variables.name: fLineNumber
variables.comment:
* The line number where the error occured, 
     * or -1 if there is no line number available.

variables.name: fUri
variables.comment:
* The URI where the error occured, 
     * or null if there is no URI available.

variables.name: fByteOffset
variables.comment:
* The byte offset into the input source this locator is pointing to or -1 
     * if there is no byte offset available

variables.name: fUtf16Offset
variables.comment:
* The UTF-16, as defined in [Unicode] and Amendment 1 of [ISO/IEC 10646], 
     * offset into the input source this locator is pointing to or -1 if there 
     * is no UTF-16 offset available.

methods.name: public int getLineNumber()
methods.comment:
* The line number where the error occured, or -1 if there is no line 
     * number available.

methods.name: public int getColumnNumber()
methods.comment:
* The column number where the error occured, or -1 if there is no column 
     * number available.

methods.name: public String getUri()
methods.comment: * The URI where the error occured, or null if there is no URI available.

methods.name: public int getByteOffset()
methods.comment:
* The byte offset into the input source this locator is pointing to or -1 
     * if there is no byte offset available

methods.name: public int getUtf16Offset()
methods.comment:
* The UTF-16, as defined in [Unicode] and Amendment 1 of [ISO/IEC 10646], 
     * offset into the input source this locator is pointing to or -1 if there 
     * is no UTF-16 offset available.
